attributes.action: Let’s NOT Call a General Election
attributes.additional_details: The last 14 years of Conservative governance left the UK in a dire state. Labour needs time to rebuild and create real change. Constant elections only breed instability and delay progress. Let’s focus on solutions, not distractions.
attributes.background: The Labour Government has just begun addressing the catastrophic state left by the Conservatives. Calling another General Election now would waste valuable time that could be spent repairing the NHS, tackling the cost-of-living crisis, and reducing debt.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do Not Call a General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/703000
